snippet: An influx of jobs and new residents is reviving the Ohio River shoreline at Cincinnati, once hampered by pollution and an exodus of manufacturing.
abstract: Influx of jobs and new residents is reviving the Ohio River shoreline in Cincinnati; although hampered by pollution and an exodus of manufacturing in recent years, area is once again emerging as a hub of civic and economic vitality.
lead_paragraph: An influx of jobs and new residents is reviving the Ohio River shoreline at Cincinnati, once hampered by pollution and an exodus of manufacturing.

headline.seo: Cincinnati Comes Back to Its Ohio River Shoreline
headline.main: An Ohio River City Comes Back to Its Shoreline
headline.print_headline: An Ohio River City Comes Back to Its Shoreline
